author: Saptaparna
body: This PR is a response to PR #25343 (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/25343). The gen related configs have been updated with new gridpacks that should solve the issues encountered in sl7 setup.
title: GEN related PR: Updating configs in Configuration/Generator/python/ with new gridpacks to fix errors (ref. PR 25343)
